item.title: Knjiga prof.dr. Zdravka Valtera na web stranicama MathWorks-a
item.description:
MATLAB Simulink Based Books ElektriÄni strojevi i pogoni s Matlabom (Electrical machines and drives with MATLAB
Written for advanced-level students and engineers, this book provides comprehensive coverage of MATLAB and Simulink and their use for modeling and simulation of electronic machines and drives. Early chapters introduce the reader to modeling using MATLAB and Simulink. Later chapters introduce more advanced topics using SimPowerSystems.
